headline: /C O R R E C T I O N -- Pizza Hut/
summary: This National Pizza Month, Pizza Hut is celebrating big by bringing its iconic Big Dinner Box back into the spotlight alongside a new campaign with PEPSI® and quarterback Josh Allen, plus a new "Hijack the Hut" program. Complete with two Medium 1-Topping Pizzas, 5 breadsticks and 8 boneless wings, the Big Dinner Box is designed to feed friends, family, and all the good times worth celebrating, starting at $19.99.

thumbnail.caption: PIZZA HUT’S BIG DINNER BOX RETURNS TAKING CENTER STAGE FOR NATIONAL PIZZA MONTH (PRNewsfoto/Pizza Hut)
